review: Great media service with a very good selection of media. With Amazon Prime it's even better. However, the WiFi is not as strong as my ChromeCast and it only worked reliably when my router was very close to the FireTV stick. Luckily I have a two router setup in my house because it would not work with where my main router is located about 70 feet away, but my ChromeCast was working fine. Tech support told me it worked best with 5MHz Wi-Fi routers, but it works fine with 2500 Hz router as long as it's a really strong signal. Excellent once it's working.
author: TC

review: This is by far my favorite streaming device. Easy to install, handy remote, and great on screen options. The home screen is a little busy and requires a bit of scrolling but the performance and options compared to competitors can't be beat.
